New Records: Yashasvi Jaiswal broke Rohit Sharma's 13-year-old T20I record for scoring 75-plus runs in a single match at the age of 21 years and 227 days.
Key Match Events: Yashasvi Jaiswal scored an unbeaten 84 runs to help India win by 9 wickets and level the series 2-2.
Openers Yashasvi Jaiswal and Shubman Gill formed a 165-run stand for the first wicket, the third-highest for India in T20Is.
Post-Match Reflections: Yashasvi Jaiswal was awarded the Man of the Match for his performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match resulted in India's sixth-biggest win in terms of wickets in T20Is.
